website_summaries.verdict: An assortment pack of band saw blades that gives you cutting power with optimized tooth geometry.
pros: Blades made from premium-grade steel, resist heat build-up for longer life
Manufacturer claims tooth geometry is optimized for best cutting performance
3 sizes included in this package for various uses
cons: About 15-20% of purchasers thought the blades were too thin (too easily breakable) and/or not sharp enough

website_summaries.verdict: An assortment pack of band saw blades gives you the cutting power with optimized tooth geometry.
pros: Blades made from premium grade steel, resist heat build-up for longer life
Manufacturer claims tooth geometry is optimized for best cutting performance
3 sizes included in this package for various uses
cons: About 15-20% of purchasers thought the blades were too thin (too easily breakable) and/or not sharp enough

customer_reviews.title: Excellent 3 Package SKIL Blades
customer_reviews.text: Excellent blades, all three. They were the correct blades to fit my SKIL 3386-01 2.5-Amp 9-inch band saw. They were in excellent condition. One blade is 1/8 inch scroll fine, and one blade is 1/4 inch general purpose, and one blade is 3/8 inch heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D Mowery

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, I guess on these. No issues on the stock (WEN---so we're not talking high grade, here) blades, but these Skill blades are inaccurate, have a thicker kerf for some reason and take forever to cut through material unless you want to chance the blade breaking under force, which is what happened on both I tried. I finally just threw the other one out as well. Cheap material, mine had several "bends" in the blades upon opening. Skip this product and save a finger or two.
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS W.

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: I receive these blades from Amazon, they were shipped very quickly. I was excited to get some new blades to be able to cut through hardwood Burl doing my hobby work little quicker than my old blade of that was getting a bit dull. Unfortunately, these blades do not cut is well as the overused blade that I was replacing that came with my bandsaw. It's rather unfortunate. Personally I would save your money and get a higher quality blade. I really expected more out of these.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good price for 3 blades and they fit great on my delta shopmaster band saw. Just make sure your saw is tuned correctly and you won't have an issue. I have cut soft and hardwoods with these blades and so far they have performed great without dulling or breaking. Always use the thickest blade you can for what you have to cut (in terms of curves) so you have a straighter, better quality cut.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Jones

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Good value for your money. I needed extra blades for my band saw and these fit the bill nicely. Not the best quality in the world but they seem to be true to size and should work well for the hobbyist. The three sizes will allow me to better use the correct blade for the task. If I need something that cuts better, I know to spend the cash on a dedicated blade for what I am doing. So for $20, I am happy. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Bret

customer_reviews.title: SKIL 80151 59-1/2-Inch Band Saw Blade Assortment, 3-Pack
customer_reviews.text: First time I received these blades, the 1/8" was too short. I returned and got another set. (Amazon was great help with my return!) I ordered another. The blades are a little "flimsy" but, If I cut real slow, they do the job ok. I would say that overall, It is a good item for the money!
customer_reviews.author: "Little Johnny"

customer_reviews.title: Fits off-brand saws
customer_reviews.text: These blades were shipped and receive quickly. They are of good quality and fit my off-brand saw perfectly. The chain store that still sells the saws does not carry blades to fit them. This assortment of blades adds versatility to the saw.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy blades
customer_reviews.text: Blades feel and look cheap. The medium blade's (6tpi) cut is not at all smooth, unlike my original blade. The original blade in my saw was only .001 thicker, same tpi, but felt so much more robust and cut so much cleaner. These look they were just punched out of sheet steel. Not impressed with the quality overall.
customer_reviews.author: Ray M

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Disregard my last review. Some how I manage to figure out what I was doing wrong trying to mount the blades. I hope the large blade last longer than the medium blade did.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Redrow

customer_reviews.title: Not for Rhyobi band saw!!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit my Ryobi band saw, even tho Amazon recommended this package.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Thorsen

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: My husband needed a new blade and both the quality and price are great! Will purchase again as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Warmoth

customer_reviews.title: They Work
customer_reviews.text: These. Blades work well with my portable Skil Band Saw. I'll be buying more in the future
customer_reviews.author: Muhammad Raafi

customer_reviews.title: Blades of Steel
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my grandfather when I accidentally broke one of his blades when working on his bandsaw, opps! It was so quick and easy to find this product. He says they work great and match the name brand ones he usually uses. A great price for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Timely delivery
customer_reviews.text: The three pack is convenant for different projects, but for me a three pack of the same size blade would've worked better. I'm cutting out memorial Christmas ornaments
customer_reviews.author: Earle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, perfect cuts.
customer_reviews.text: Fits on easily, cuts very well on my Skil band saw! I use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: CoffeeCup

customer_reviews.title: Deceiving! Not for metal, despite what it says in description.
customer_reviews.text: Description says for wood and metal, but this pack is for wood only. Not worth the money for me to drive to town to return it during this "pandemic".
customer_reviews.author: sheldon dement

customer_reviews.title: 3 Different blades that work well
customer_reviews.text: 3 Different sized blades that fit my existing band saw and work well.
customer_reviews.author: Helper

customer_reviews.title: Find a better brand
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping but the blades were no sharper than the dull one I took off...Not happy
customer_reviews.author: Judy G.

customer_reviews.title: Very useful to my woodworking hobby.
customer_reviews.text: I like the product because It's very convenient to use the small blade when cutting curvy project. I use new blade for the entire week work but i look at the blade still very shsrp. Thank you Amazon for the nice produst.
customer_reviews.author: Matias  O from Philippines

customer_reviews.title: Band Saw Blades
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the band saw that I bought for my husband. I really had no idea what I was getting, but he was very pleased when it arrived and he saw that there were 3 different blades in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Saw Blade Length were different (1) too long and (2) too short to fit their own Blade Saw
customer_reviews.text: All three blades were different lengths and would not fit MY SKIL BANDSAW.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: This product fit my small Skil saw to a "T", therefore saving me the expense of a newer, larger one that I did not want. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: G. Mansfield

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy for hobby projects
customer_reviews.text: The welds are a little bumpy, but the blades cut well if you don't rush. I can handle all my hobby projects with these three blades. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Flyback

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Great product and timely delivery, was exactly as described and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Craig Richards

customer_reviews.title: Good quality blades
customer_reviews.text: All the blades seem to be in good condition and very sharp. I believe that they are made by Bosch which is a good quality manufacturing company for tools.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great Set.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Delta saw, the small blade can cut like a scroll saw. Its stays sharp after allot of use.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cappelli

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described and does what it is supposed to. Good Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and does what it is supposed to. Good Quality.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Holdenn

customer_reviews.title: 3/8 blade was dull out of the box
customer_reviews.text: 3/8 blade was dull out of the box. Wouldn't even cut 3/4 white pine. 1/4 blade was okay. 1/8 was dull. Apparently these were seconds. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: good blade
customer_reviews.text: good blade...i run one about 1 month in pine hard wood, has a smooth cut and not much swag while cutting...
customer_reviews.author: jessie taylor

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and sharp. Deleivered and packaged on time and properly.
customer_reviews.author: billy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The blades are a bit pricey. However, they are the right fit.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I haven,t used all the blades but the one I have on works perfectly. I'm sure the rest of them will work great.
customer_reviews.author: Jerico1

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tried the 1/8" blade - doesn't cut well. burns the wood
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I guess its the saw not the blade or both
customer_reviews.author: Sas AB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the 3 different size are a great value. and makes for a variety of COMPLETED projects
customer_reviews.author: Alanne Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: just what it is suppose to be, no less in any way
customer_reviews.author: William E. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Would have liked a finer toothed blade but these will get most jobs done.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Rothrock

customer_reviews.title: Cuts wood like it should
customer_reviews.text: Only used one blade so far. Cuts wood like it should.
customer_reviews.author: Carthel Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Misrepresented
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Blades were advertised to cut metal and they do not. It is clearly marked on the packaging that the blades included in the package do not meet the specs for cutting metal
customer_reviews.author: Peter Homulos

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A nice set of blades to have on hand for replacement
customer_reviews.author: Bert R. Magnuson

customer_reviews.title: Nice assortment. Blades fit my Task Force band saw ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice assortment. Blades fit my Task Force band saw just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the band soul and with the band saw blade
customer_reviews.author: John Collins

customer_reviews.title: get a decent blade these are not very good.
customer_reviews.text: cheap metal, wanders all over, tooth set inaccurate, spend more money, get a decent blade these are not very good.
customer_reviews.author: doug

customer_reviews.title: General Purpose blades
customer_reviews.text: There are 3 various size wood blades: 15-1/8-.012 for general purpose all wood and PVC; 6-1/4-.012 for wood, plywood and PVC; 6-3/8-.012 for wood, plywood and PVC. Each is general purpose but work fine for small projects. Radious cuts for each blade is listed on the back of the package. There are better blades you can buy, but the bundle saves money and the blades do maintain good cutting sharpness for multiple projects.
customer_reviews.author: myk

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but not quite what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these blades for my Skil tabletop bandsaw because I thought I'd get the same blades as I got when I bought the saw. The blades work, but they are much thinner and, I'm sure, will break more quickly than the original.
customer_reviews.author: John Vasi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived ahead of time and it is exactly what I needed for my ban saw.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M. Batty

customer_reviews.title: Happy but unhappy
customer_reviews.text: Happy but unhappy. I put the 1/4 inch blade on first because I needed to do some scroll work. Hardly had any tension on the blade as I was tracking it to the center of the tires and it popped ! I put the next size up on my tool and it's been running fine for weeks now.
customer_reviews.author: M. Robino

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the product I needed. Delivered on time and in one piece. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD W GRAVES JR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product received packed very substantial and when installed on band saw performed as expected
customer_reviews.author: Arthur J Johnson

customer_reviews.title: ... box my first use of the "medium" blade was horrible. It has the worst drift I have ever ...
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box my first use of the "medium" blade was horrible. It has the worst drift I have ever seen. Couldn't cut a straight line with it. Put the older blade back in and it works fine. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amatek

customer_reviews.title: Pure JUNK.
customer_reviews.text: The blades arrived quickly and packed well. The fit is perfect. The reason I give a one star is because they cut like they never was sharpened. My old worn out blade cuts better. Never will I ever buy the skill brand again. Pure junk.
customer_reviews.author: Willy

customer_reviews.title: product as good as I could expect
customer_reviews.text: I did not give this a five-star rating, because from all appearances, these blades are not as good as the ones I use professionally in the shop I work in. However, that is not a concern. I did have another problem: I could not use these blades at all because the owners manual of my band saw gave the wrong size! Otherwise, no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Blane E. Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Sadly Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These blades are quite possibly the worst wood cutting blades I've ever experienced. As other reviewers have noted, it's as if these blades were never sharpened. The evidence is my picture below. This was literally the first cut out of the package through a small oak piece.
customer_reviews.author: nathan downing

customer_reviews.title: Nice blades
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to have extra blades for my band saw. Haven't used yet.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

product_meta.title: SKIL 80151 59-1/2-Inch Band Saw Blade Assortment, 3-Pack
product_meta.description:
Style:Band Saw BladeSkil band saw blades are made from premium grade steel that resists heat buildup which provides long life for the blade. The unique tooth geometry is optimized for the best performance during cutting. A variety of sizes and types are offered to cover wood and metal applications. Bosch band saw blades are designed to fit most popular brand band saws, including 9-Inch and 10-Inch band saws.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Skil band saw blades are made from premium grade steel that resists heat buildup which provides long life for the blade. The unique tooth geometry is optimized for the best performance during cutting. A variety of sizes and types are offered to cover wood and metal applications. Bosch band saw blades are designed to fit most popular brand band saws, including 9-Inch and 10-Inch band saws.
feature_bullets: Resists heat build up for longer life
Optimized tooth geometry for best cutting performance
Tooth Count: 892 , Teeth per Inch - 15, 6 TPI

specifications.Included Components: 3 59-1/2 In. Blades: 1/8 In. x 15 TPI, 1/4 In. x 6 TPI, 3/8 In. x 6 TPI
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars333 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
